summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of Three Thousand Forty-seven and 21/100 (3,047.21) Dollars, from the Water Fund, or so much thereof as may be necessary, to pay the City's portions of the cost of the improvement of Seventh Avenue et al, by constructing water mains, therein, as provided for in Ordinance No. 18549, creating Local Improvement District No. 1748.
